name: BulletHeal
description:
With your health draining fast from poison, you must get hit by bullets to keep your health up.

All of the art and almost all of the sound assets were created in the duration of the weekend.

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/sf-pixelate-font.html

Dragondoodler222 - Programming, Music, Level Design; lowof -- Programming, SFX; geryongames -- Art, Programming, Music

Controls:

WASD - Movement, Space - Dash, E - interact, skip text, M - mute music, P - pause
